description:
Mantle`s Krookodile is an extremely strong Pok√©mon that originally scared Yolton`s Rotom from the battlefield and therefore Mantle won ownership of the hotel.
In the alternate past, Ash Ketchum and his friends helped Yolton`s Rotom with a Forme changing strategy in order to overcome its normal weakness against Mantle`s Krookodile. It proved to be a super effective strategy and Yolton`s Rotom was able to defeat Mantle`s Krookodile so that Yolton could retain ownership of the hotel.
name: Waruvial (Mantle)
